title: IWeldmentCutListFeature.KeepMissingItems
description: Gets or sets whether to continue to show cut list items that were deleted from the weldment in the weldment cut list table.
returns: True to keep missing cut list items, false to not
remarks:
Use
IWeldmentCutListFeature::StrikeoutMissingItems
to determine if deleted items are to be shown with strikeout formatting in the weldment cut list table.
